Reviews.Title: Incredible deal!
Reviews.Author: Eric Escobar
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived in great shape, charged up and ready to go. I highly recommend this seller. The GF2 is a steal if you can get it under a hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: Its feels like a mini DSLR
Reviews.Author: Francis
Reviews.Content: Great cheap interchangeable lens point and shoot. It has everything a dslr would have just in a compact size. If you have extra cash however go with the olympus om-d.

ProductInfo.Features:
Battery Charger, Battery Pack, Battery Case, Body Cap, Hot Shoe Cover, AV Cable, USB Connection Cable, Shoulder Strap, Stylus pen
Smaller, Lighter Interchangeable Lenses
1080/60i HD Video (Stereo Sound)
3D Lens Ready
Intuitively Easy with a 3.0 Touch Controlled LCD
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2KBODY 12.1 MP Compact System Camera Body with 3" LCD Display
